price: ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߛߎߓߊ߯ߦߊ ߟߋ߫ ߣߌ߲߬ ߘߌ߫ ߓߊ߬ ߥߟߴߊߟߎ߫ ߕߍ߫ ߦߋߟߌ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬؟
arabic: أَفَسِحۡرٌ هَٰذَآ أَمۡ أَنتُمۡ لَا تُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: afasiḥ'run hādhā am antum lā tub'ṣirūna
